about_the_game:
An empty Apartment at the End of the World...

As you step off the elevator onto The Seventh Floor, you ask yourself, "Have I been here before?" The clocks are approaching midnight and something is emerging. As you step off the elevator, back onto The Seventh Floor, you ask yourself "Have I been here before?"...

Built upon the foundation of tension and anticipation, The Seventh Floor pits the player against an unknown encroaching horror, allowing the player to uncover the truth of this place. Through highly granular interaction and a non linear sandbox environment, players piece together clues as they explore. Slowly they will uncover what has befallen the residents and what larger ramifications that has for us all.
